data.title: Did Mila Kunis Just Reveal That She and Ashton Kutcher Are Married? See Her Ring!
data.meta_description: Speculation that Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher secretly wed have been going on for months now—ever since Ashton posted a not-so-subtle message on Facebook—but looks like it's all true: Mila kind of, sort of admitted that she's a married lady. While being interviewed on The Late Late Show With James Corden, Mila was asked if she's married. She responded with a vague, "I don't know, maybe!" But she quickly called out on the fact that she's wearing a ring on her ring finger and she's all giggles when James declares to the crowd that Mila and Ashton are married. Watch it all go down in the video below. I'll be watching and re-watching to try to get every possible glimpse of Mila's ring: So, what do you think? Are they married?! I think so!
data.text:
Speculation that Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher secretly wed have been going on for months now—ever since Ashton posted a not-so-subtle message on Facebook—but looks like it's all true: Mila kind of, sort of admitted that she's a married lady.

While being interviewed on The Late Late Show With James Corden, Mila was asked if she's married. She responded with a vague, "I don't know, maybe!" But she quickly called out on the fact that she's wearing a ring on her ring finger and she's all giggles when James declares to the crowd that Mila and Ashton are married.

Watch it all go down in the video below. I'll be watching and re-watching to try to get every possible glimpse of Mila's ring:
